heading: HR02252
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEES ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD, GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION, AND OVERSIGHT ON AGRICULTURE AND FISHERIES MODERNIZATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE PROGRAMS AND POLICIES OF THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) AND TO KNOW THE REASON OF NON-FULFILLMENT OF ITS MANDATE IN PROVIDING FOOD SUFFICIENCY IN THE COUNTRY
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02252
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE COMMITTEES ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD, GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION, AND OVERSIGHT ON AGRICULTURE AND FISHERIES MODERNIZATION TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE PROGRAMS AND POLICIES OF THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) AND TO KNOW THE REASON OF NON-FULFILLMENT OF ITS MANDATE IN PROVIDING FOOD SUFFICIENCY IN THE COUNTRY
